channel.title: How do i remove quest items? [317]
channel.description: there are items like neitiznot and d skimy that need quests for but there are no quests... how can i make them normal?

item.title: How do i remove quest items? [317]
item.dc:creator: @kennyg kennyg
item.description:
@kennyg wrote:

Go into client.java and search public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { Find the item id in there and delete it. So for neitznot helm it’ll look like this if(wearID == 3753 && q8 != 15){ sM("You must complete Lunar Diplomacy to equip this."); return false; }
Just delete that. Then search for the item id either up or down I can’t remember and it should look like this for neitznot helm if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 3753 && q8 != 15){ playerEquipment[playerHat] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0,playerHat); } Delete the && q8 != 15){ part. Or to make this MUCH easier, you could just make it default that all quests are complete when logged in so they can wield the items without you having to do anything hard.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i remove quest items? [317]
